Title: Angshumaner Chhobi
Writer: Suchandra Chowdhury (lyrics), Atanu Ghosh (screenplay), Atanu Ghosh (story)
Actors: Bhaskar Banerjee, Anjana Basu, Bobby Chakraborty, Sabyasachi Chakraborty
Plot: Angshuman, a young film director, comes back from Italy after eight years, having studied cinema there, to make his first film. He puts up a determined fight against all obstacles to ...
